name: py-snakemake-executor-plugin-cluster-sync

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A Snakemake executor plugin for cluster jobs that are executed
synchronously.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-snakemake-interface-common
dependencies.description: Common functions and classes for Snakemake and its plugins.

dependencies.name: py-snakemake-interface-executor-plugins
dependencies.description:
This package provides a stable interface for interactions between
Snakemake and its executor plugins.
